Articles.Content:
I mentioned this in an older post, I feel the idea of having a rover testing facility would be really useful and fun, varying gradients and terrain to test the durability and difficult of landing rovers in varying locations you can choose from.

It would be useful for people wanting to test the tipping point and max speed of rovers, AND would provide more buildings to makes KSC look slightly more full and / or virbrant. Possibly coupled with a payload construction facility for landers, station parts, and rovers? (This would make the VAB for lifting vehicles) up to the devs really.

added this thread to the already suggested list as it has been suggested several times before.

as far as my opinion is concerned, any type of testing facility is a good addition.
